name: Sunglass Pro
description: Full-stack niche-related website & users can sign up & log in via custom or Google. Fully responsive UI with slider, spinner & hover effect. Users can book or purchase a product, cancel an order & add review. Have Admin & User dashboard. Admin can delete, add, manage services & can make a user admin.

name: Travel Web
description: Full-stack tour-related website & users can sign up or log in via Google. Users can book or purchase packages, cancel the order & add services. Easy to use with a responsive user interface.

name: Dentistry
description: Dental-service-related website. Users friendly & fully responsive with slider & hover effect. Users can create a new account & log in via Custom, Google & Github

name: Verbalizer
description: React routing project. Learning for various type of language. Fully responsive UI. There have four menus home, service, about us & contact.

name: Life Skill Development
description: Life Skill Development related project.You can hire a speaker ! using hire button. Have a fees cart & here you can see the total fees.

name: Honda CBR
description: Honda CBR related simple Front-End Bootstrap project. Mobile friendly & it was my first bootstrap project.
